    M

    Mage - Class in logic.character
    Represents a Mage enemy that specializes in magic-based attacks.
    Mage(int, int) - Constructor for class logic.character.Mage
    Constructs a Mage with the specified health and attack values.
    Magic - Class in logic.cards
    A magic-based attack card that deals damage according to its rarity.
    Magic(int) - Constructor for class logic.cards.Magic
    Constructs a magic card of the given rarity.
    MagicBlockable - Interface in interfaces
    Marker interface indicating that an enemy has resistance to magic-based attacks.
    main(String[]) - Static method in class application.Main
    Main Java entry point.
    Main - Class in application
    Entry point of the game application and central navigation manager.
    Main() - Constructor for class application.Main
     
    MINIBOSS - Enum constant in enum class logic.character.EnemyType
    Mini-boss enemy, stronger than normal enemies but weaker than Boss.
    MINIBOSS_DEFEATED - Enum constant in enum class logic.gamesystem.TurnResult
    A miniboss has been defeated.
